channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Audio Station
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Audio Station

item.title: CVE-2022-27612|2024-09-17T00:45:58.126Z -- synology -- audio%20station
item.description: Buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in cgi component in Synology Audio Station before 6.5.4-3367 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2015-9104|2024-09-17T02:37:13.477Z -- synology -- audio%20station
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Synology Audio Station 5.1 before 5.1-2550 and 5.4 before 5.4-2857 allows remote authenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the album title.
